about_the_game:
A WW2 Tower Defense game, with minor aspects of an RTS game. Build up an army to defend your base. Progress throughout the game to get stronger units and strategically change your loadout for each map to get the upper edge on the enemy forces.

Features

  • Over 30 meticulously designed units representing both Allies and Axis forces
  • Command a diverse mix of tanks and infantry, ensuring a rich and dynamic battlefield experience
  • Embark on dynamic campaigns where you orchestrate the combined might of America and British forces or spearhead the Axis dominance by uniting Germany and Italy
  • Expansive selection of playable maps across various theaters of war
  • Four difficulty levels to cater to a wide range of player skills and preferences
  • Tailor your gameplay with customizable unit selection for a personalized experience
  • Accelerate the pace of gameplay with a versatile fast-forward feature, offering 1x, 2x, and 3x speed options
  • Endless waves of procedural gameplay for an infinite challenge
  • Tactical flexibility as most units are mobile, allowing strategic repositioning
  • Enhance your tactical advantage by assembling units into trios, enabling them to engage in battle together and unleash their combined strength.
  • Command with precision as your units exhibit advanced pathfinding, skillfully shooting on the move to maintain a relentless offensive

Our Roadmap

We are being ambitious and we have a lot planned for 2024. We are hoping to complete this roadmap and add stuff to it so we can provide you guys with extra content. At the end of the year, we will change to white boxes to green or red and go over what we completed and didn't finish. We will also be taking suggestions and feedback into consideration, which you can provide for us in our Discord or Steam Community. That being said, have a look at our plans for 2024!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6th gen / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 700 series / AMD Radeon 200 series
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Integrated graphics will not work DX12 or Vulkan compatible device is required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10th gen / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB / AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
